channel.title: New Rsps, Recruiting Developers!
channel.description:
I'm starting a Rsps and i'm in need of a few developers. If you want to apply here you can do so with this template.
[code]Current Age:
Experience in Rsps java programming:
How many years have you been working with the Java Language:
Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers:
How many R.S.P.S. have you personally founded:
Do you have experience in Website Design and Development:
Please list any and all Languages which you are knowledgeable of:
How many Hours per Day can you be active and ready to work:
How many Hours per Week will you be on:
How dependable are you:
Will i be able to contact you through Skype?
Can you be trusted if given access to a Dedicated, or trusted with vital information:[/code]
The base will be PI. This will need summoning, & dung. 100% stability. No dupes. No deadlocks. Alot of content.
Also, you will be paid depending on how much donations i receive from the server. The only money i will be keeping is the money for Vps & webhosting. The rest of the money will be split out to all the developers.
I have alot of things that i will need to be developed, not just the things i listed above. We will talk more if you wanna be in the development team.

item.title: New Rsps, Recruiting Developers!
item.dc:creator: @Verprex Verprex
item.description:
@Verprex wrote:

[quote=“Lirimoo, post:4, topic:478716”]Current Age: 14

Development Experiences: I’ve Coded much much with Friends ,and helped them.

Experience in Video Game Design:9/10

Experience in Video Game Development:9/10

Programming Experience in Years:2

How many years have you been working with the Java Language:2

Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers:I’ve helped Jesse RSW with Scronix , we both coded it , Since he didnt give me any Credits , it got deleted. .

How many R.S.P.S. have you personally founded:Not really founded , Scronix with Jesse.

Public Releases and Information:NO LINK

Do you have experience in Website Design and Development:Ofcourse i Do.

Please list any and all Languages which you are knowledgeable of:Php , Html , Java

Do you have a Certified Diploma or Degree in regards as to Programming:No.

Level of Education (School/College):

Personal Recommendations (people who will vouch for claims):

How many Hours per Day can you be active and ready to work:Up to 8 Hours.

How many Hours per Week will you be on:I dont know , but will be much.

Are you currently an employee anywhere:No.

How dependable are you:Sorry ? I dont know what this means im not english :s

Will i be able to contact you through Skype? Ofcourse , add me on Skype. “Lirimoo”

Can you be trusted if given access to a Dedicated, or trusted with vital information:Ofcourse.[/quote]

Went through your threads and post.
First thing i saw was this.

Obvious answer now.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“GolemXScape, post:2, topic:478716”]Current Age: at the moment i am almost 18 2 more months…

Development Experiences: ive coded 1 by myself and i have helped people in the past as co owner

Experience in Video Game Design: 8/10

Experience in Video Game Development: 7/10

Programming Experience in Years: 3

How many years have you been working with the Java Language: 3

Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers:
GolemXScape, and some 317 servers that i got scammed from but i coded…

How many R.S.P.S. have you personally founded: 1, GolemXScape

Public Releases and Information: i dont release much to the public

Do you have experience in Website Design and Development: yes i do, i rate myself somewhere between 7/10 or 8/10

Please list any and all Languages which you are knowledgeable of: english and french?

Do you have a Certified Diploma or Degree in regards as to Programming:
no not yet, i plan on taking a few courses in my future
